Expected Keywords: anti-abuse; intra-group; financing; interest; arm's length; substance
Ground Truth: Intra-group financing must be at arm's length and have commercial substance. Anti-abuse provisions may apply if arrangements lack genuine business purpose

Query: What are the conditions for Qualifying Free Zone Person status?
Expected Keywords: qualifying; free zone; substance; qualifying income; excluded activities; adequate
Ground Truth: Must be registered in Free Zone, maintain adequate substance, derive qualifying income, have audited financials, and not elect to be taxed at 9%

Query: How are losses carried forward under UAE Corporate Tax?
Expected Keywords: loss; carry forward; offset; 75%; taxable income; limit
Ground Truth: Tax losses can be carried forward indefinitely but offset is limited to 75% of taxable income in any given period. Some losses cannot be carried forward upon ownership change
